name: BeatSwapSwapBeat
description:
-Made for  Mix and Jams GameJam(2020) in 48 hrs-

the theme was mixing genres

So I took a DJ mixing music genres and made it into a "rhythm based" x "endless runner".

-Controls-

Space Bar - Jump

E -Scratch to the next Vinyl

Try to move to the beat to increase your score multiplier, if you hit a bump you will lose it.
